questions.question: Which of the following is a self-serve workflow?
options: A citizen uses a city's website to request and receive data in their desired format.
A proficient FME Desktop user opens up their workspace and runs it.
An FME Server administrator runs a workspace using FME Server.
An Automation automatically runs to back up a database every night.

questions.question: Which of the following scenarios would NOT be considered either a Data Upload or Data Download scenario?
options: The user logs on to a web page, draws an area on the map, and is sent a copy of the data within that area.
The user submits a dataset to a web site that scans the data for errors, and returns a corrected copy.
The user publishes a workspace that writes data to an online PostGIS database.
The user starts a GIS application, clicks File > Add Data to Map, and pastes in a URL from FME Server.

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a Transformation Service?
